status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1a6o6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3blsk","text":"\t70% EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rpqs","text":"\tPBS 1x (without Ca or Mg) [Fisher MT21-040CM]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6390o","text":"\t0.5M EDTA ph 8.0 [Fisher NC9942732]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drfa","text":"\tBovine Serum Albumin (BSA) [Sigma A2153]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d8a5","text":"\tFetal Bovine Serum (FBS) [Fisher SH3007103]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2e62v","text":"\tDimethyl Sulfoxide (DMSO) [Sigma D4540-100ml]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"782r3","text":"\tAcridine Orange/Propidium  Iodide (AO/PI) [Fisher NC0285242]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vrrs","text":"\tFicoll Paque Plus GE Healthcare [Fisher NC9778355]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97p5n","text":"\tIMDM with L-Glutamine [Fisher MT10-016-CV]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23hft","text":"\tLiquid Nitrogen Cryotubes [MidSci TP89020]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7149d","text":"\t-196C Labels [MidSci LCRY-1700]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmp89","text":"\t1.75ml Micro centrifuge tubes [MidSci MCT-175-B]\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2taqc","text":"\tFreeze Media [DMSO/BS]: Thaw FBS at 37.9C. Add 45ml DMSO to 500ul FBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4jn6","text":"\tRinsing Buffer [EDTA/PBS]: Add 4ml of 0.5M EDTA liquid to 1000ml of PBS 1x. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l95g","text":"\tRunning Buffer [BSA/EDTA/PBS] Reconstitute BSA to 5% in 110ml of sterile filtered water. Add 5% BSA solution and 4.4 ml of 0.5M EDTA liquid to 1000ml of PBS 1x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0vnt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vrh0","text":"All solutions should be combined in a hood for sterile purposes. Autoclaving all solutions before use is strongly recommended. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cq7g1","text":"\tPipettes and Micro Pipettes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4f8ct","text":"\t15ml and 50ml conicals","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qbg8","text":"\tMicrocentrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4j35","text":"\tAutomacs cell separator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca020","text":"\tHemacytometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffv6l","text":"\tMicroscope ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41qa2","text":"\tCentrifuge ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9vfu","text":"\t-80C storage box","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffvjk","text":"\tIsopropanol storage container","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6qa","text":"\t4C Refrigerator ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v8c3","text":"\t-80C Freezer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o14m","text":"\t-196C Liquid Nitrogen Storage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3j2kj","text":"Bone marrow aspirate (BMA) is removed from the iliac crest of a patient  using a biopsy needle and placed in an EDTA Tube before the bone marrow mononuclear cells are isolated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5u60o","text":"1.\tAdd IMDM equal to the total BMA volume to the EDTA tubes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46f20","text":"2.\tIn 15/50ml conicals, add BMA/IMDM mixture into each with an equal amount of Ficoll-Paque (i.e. total BMA/IMDM volume is 14ml, place 3.5ml Ficoll \u0026 7ml BMA/IMDM into two conicals). Note, tilt the 15ml conical to a 45O angle and layer the BMA/IMDM on top of the Ficoll (Don’t let the BMA mix with the Ficoll).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vmgm","text":"3.\tCentrifuge the 15/50ml conicals for 25 minutes with no brake at 1400rpm and 4C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb14l","text":"4.\tCarefully remove conicals from centrifuge and notice the layers. From bottom to top: RBCs, clear ficoll, cloudy interphase cells, and pink plasma + IMDM. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cbjt","text":"5.\tUsing a glass pipette, collect the interphase cell layer avoiding Ficoll and place in a new 15ml conical.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnvne","text":"6.\tFill to the 14ml line on the conical with Rinsing Buffer and centrifuge 5min at 1500rpm and 20C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vdu3","text":"7.\tAfter centrifuge, aspirate the supernatant and resuspend the pellet in 10ml of Rinsing Buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p868","text":"8.\tPlace a sterile pre-separation filter on top of a new 15ml conical. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqeqc","text":"9.\tPre-wet the filter with 300ul of Rinsing Buffer, then filter the re-suspended cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3fnn","text":"10.\tPlace 10ul of this re-suspension into a microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39r4e","text":"11.\tRecord total amount of resuspension before spinning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mna7","text":"12.\tSpin 15ml conical for 5min at 1500rpm and 20C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvskv","text":"13.\tIn a 1ml cryovial, add 10ul AO/PI and 10ul aliquot of the BMMCs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vbhr","text":"14.\tPlace 10ul on hemocytometer and count live:dead, then record. Note, be sure to multiple by total volume of BMMCs ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hm2v","text":"15.\tRemove supernatant, re-suspend in 1.5 mL of Freeze Media for approximately every 5E6 cells and aliquot into cryovials. Note, before use you must thaw Freeze Media in H2O bath. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93git","text":"16.\tLabel each cryovial with barcoded label.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5idp1","text":"17.\tStore in cryovials of ~1e7 total cell aliquot(s). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qq4p","text":"18.\tAllow to Freeze slowly in a freezing chamber at -80C for 24 hours, then place the vial in Liq Nitrogen for long term storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1r4v0","text":"19.\tComplete the processing and sample documentation sheet(s). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13nom","text":"Protocol Provided by DiPersio Lab and Vij Lab at Washington University. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Multiple Myeloma Banking Collection and Processing Protocol (WUSTL)
